summary: Esteemed writer Mahmoud suffers from writers block. While trying to work at the family estate, concerns about an unproductive pear tree trigger in him memories of his childhood love for beautiful tomboy "M".
cast: Homayoun Ershadi|Golshifteh Farahani|Mohammad Reza Shaban-Noori|Nematollah Gorji|Ahou Alagha|Sassan Bagherpour|Jafar Bozorgi|Shaghayegh Farahani|Aram Ghasemy|Amir Ali Ghezelayagh|Shahram Haghighat Doost|Rahman Hoseini|Jahangir Mirshekari|Maryam Moghbeli|Maliheh Nazari
title: Derakhte Golabi
